Package cycling

Class Stage

java.lang.Object
cycling.Stage
All Implemented Interfaces:
StageInterface, Serializable
public class Stage extends Object implements StageInterface, Serializable
Stage class. This class implements the StageInterface as well as using a variety of original methods. This class also manages all the stages within CyclingPortal.
See Also:

      description - The description for the stage.
      length - The total length of the stage.
      startTime - The start time for the stage.
      type - The type of stage that the stage will be in the race.

      public void deleteAdjustedTime(int riderId)
      Deletes a rider's ID and their adjusted finish time in the hashmap.
      Parameters:

    • calculateRidersAdjustedTime

      public LocalTime calculateRidersAdjustedTime(int riderId)
      Method that calculates the rider's adjusted time based on other rider finish times. This calculates the rider's adjusted time by checking each consecutive rider, who has a finish time within 1 second faster (smaller) than their previous rider. Both times will then be set to the smallest of the two (the fastest).
      Specified by:
      calculateRidersAdjustedTime in interface StageInterface
      Parameters:
      riderId - The ID of the rider, which there finish time is being adjusted.
      Returns:
      The adjusted finish time of the rider.

    • calculateRidersRankInStage

      public int[] calculateRidersRankInStage()
      Methods that finds and calculates all of the riders' ranks sorted based on their finish time in the stage, with the winner (1st place) being the fastest.
      Specified by:
      calculateRidersRankInStage in interface StageInterface
      Returns:
      A sorted array of all the rider IDs based on their finish time.

    • getRankedAdjustedElapsedTimesInStage

      public LocalTime[] getRankedAdjustedElapsedTimesInStage()
      Method that finds all of the riders' adjusted elapsed times sorted based on their rank that they received in the stage.
      Specified by:
      getRankedAdjustedElapsedTimesInStage in interface StageInterface
      Returns:
      A sorted array of all the riders' adjusted finish times based on their rank in the stage.

    • atomicReset

      public static void atomicReset()
      Method that resets the ID counter. The ID counter creates a new ID for every single new rider that is created.
